com.servicediscovery
Class SdlCommon

java.lang.Object
  com.servicediscovery.SdlCommon
All Implemented Interfaces:
MulticastReceive
public class SdlCommon
extends java.lang.Object
implements MulticastReceive

This is the service discovery layer on the android communication process side. It has the Multicast layer object. The responsibility of this class is to broadcast message when any application wants to send a message. Also when one message is received, it will distribute the message to all of the applications that are registered to the android communication process.

Author:
Pengcheng
